name: Bruschetta
ingredients: 2 to 4 Cloves garlic depending on preference
1 Loaf of Italian bread (or any bread you prefer for texture)
instructions: Slice the bread about 1/2 inch thick and drizzle with 2 Tablespoons of the olive oil.
Toast the bread in the oven until golden.
Dice the tomatoes and add them to a large bowl.
Mince the basil and garlic and add it to the bowl.
Then add the balsamic vinegar, the rest of the olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Mix thoroughly and spoon an even amount on to each slice of bread.
Sprinkle the parmesean on top and serve!
